6126.verse-arabic: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
6126.verse-english: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

clauses-english.clause: We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

6127.verse-english: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

clauses-english.clause: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

6128.verse-arabic: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
6128.verse-english: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

clauses-arabic.clause: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ

clauses-english.clause: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

6129.verse-arabic: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
6129.verse-english: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

clauses-arabic.clause: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ

clauses-english.clause: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

6130.verse-english: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

clauses-english.clause: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
